access: A character who is a member of the Pathfinder Society has access to this option.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fortifying Pebble](/Equipment.aspx?ID=522)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 13 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor, shield, or weapon

</row>

**Access** A character who is a member of the Pathfinder Society has access to this option.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** The affixed object would take damage

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small pebble is strangely dense and surprisingly durable, affixed to an object by a sturdy steel chain. When you activate the pebble, the affixed object takes 10 less damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fortifying Pebble
